name: New Policy Issuance and Delivery
description: End-to-end process from approved new business application through final policy document generation, quality assurance, and delivery to customer and agent. Includes coordination of all documentation and compliance requirements.
objective: Ensure timely and accurate delivery of new policies to customers while maintaining compliance and quality standards, improving customer satisfaction and reducing time-to-issue.

tasks.name: Retrieve and Validate Approved New Business Application
tasks.description: Obtain the approved new business application from underwriting system and verify all required underwriting approvals, signatures, and supporting documentation are present.
tasks.expected_output: Validated application package with approval confirmation and completeness checklist

tasks.name: Perform Compliance and Regulatory Review
tasks.description: Conduct comprehensive review of the application against all applicable regulatory requirements, AML/KYC compliance, and state-specific insurance regulations.
tasks.expected_output: Compliance verification report with sign-off on regulatory adherence and any identified compliance gaps

tasks.name: Extract and Standardize Policy Data
tasks.description: Extract all policy information from the application and standardize data fields according to policy management system requirements and data governance standards.
tasks.expected_output: Standardized policy data file ready for system entry with data mapping documentation

tasks.name: Create Policy Record in Management System
tasks.description: Input standardized policy data into the policy management system, establish policy number, and configure all system settings for the new policy.
tasks.expected_output: Active policy record in system with assigned policy number and configured parameters

tasks.name: Generate Policy Document Package
tasks.description: Automatically generate all required policy documents including declarations page, policy schedule, terms and conditions, and product-specific addendums based on policy configuration.
tasks.expected_output: Complete policy document package in PDF format with all required pages and customized content

tasks.name: Conduct Quality Assurance Review of Documents
tasks.description: Perform detailed quality assurance review of generated policy documents for accuracy, completeness, formatting, and compliance with company standards and regulatory requirements.
tasks.expected_output: QA checklist with approval or identified defects requiring correction

tasks.name: Correct Document Defects and Regenerate if Necessary
tasks.description: Address any identified QA defects by correcting policy data, regenerating documents, or making manual adjustments to ensure all documents meet quality standards.
tasks.expected_output: Corrected policy document package with all defects resolved and re-verified

tasks.name: Prepare Initial Premium Billing and Billing Arrangements
tasks.description: Calculate initial premium based on policy terms, establish billing schedule, and prepare billing record in billing system with payment terms and due dates.
tasks.expected_output: Billing record created with premium amount, billing schedule, and payment terms configured

tasks.name: Scan and Index Policy Documents to Document Management System
tasks.description: Scan all policy documents and supporting application materials, index them with appropriate metadata, and upload to the document management system for permanent record retention.
tasks.expected_output: Indexed policy file in document management system with complete audit trail and retention settings

tasks.name: Prepare Customer and Agent Delivery Communications
tasks.description: Generate personalized delivery letters and communications for both customer and agent including policy details, billing information, next steps, and contact information.
tasks.expected_output: Customized delivery communications ready for mailing or electronic delivery to customer and agent

tasks.name: Coordinate Physical and Electronic Policy Delivery
tasks.description: Arrange delivery of policy documents through appropriate channels (mail, email, agent pickup) and track delivery status to ensure timely receipt by customer and agent.
tasks.expected_output: Delivery confirmation with tracking information and delivery method documentation

tasks.name: Verify Policy Activation and System Configuration
tasks.description: Confirm policy is fully activated in all systems, verify billing is properly configured, and ensure all policy parameters are correctly reflected across policy management and billing systems.
tasks.expected_output: System verification report confirming policy activation and cross-system data consistency

tasks.name: Conduct Post-Issuance Customer Service Outreach
tasks.description: Initiate proactive customer service contact to confirm policy receipt, answer initial questions, and ensure customer satisfaction with the new policy issuance process.
tasks.expected_output: Customer contact log with confirmation of receipt and satisfaction assessment

tasks.name: Generate Policy Issuance Report and Performance Metrics
tasks.description: Create comprehensive issuance report documenting time-to-issue, compliance adherence, document quality metrics, and any issues encountered during the issuance process.
tasks.expected_output: Policy issuance report with performance metrics and process improvement recommendations

tasks.name: Archive Complete Policy File and Close Issuance Process
tasks.description: Archive all policy issuance documentation, close workflow in policy management system, and ensure complete audit trail is maintained for regulatory and compliance purposes.
tasks.expected_output: Archived policy file with closed issuance workflow and complete audit trail documentation

quick_wins.task: Extract and Standardize Policy Data
Generate Policy Document Package
Prepare Customer and Agent Delivery Communications
Generate Policy Issuance Report and Performance Metrics

opportunities.recommendation: Automate 4 fully automatable tasks to save ~3.0 hours per cycle
tasks: Extract and Standardize Policy Data
Generate Policy Document Package
Prepare Customer and Agent Delivery Communications
Generate Policy Issuance Report and Performance Metrics

opportunities.recommendation: Augment 11 human-AI collaborative tasks for partial automation
tasks: Retrieve and Validate Approved New Business Application
Perform Compliance and Regulatory Review
Create Policy Record in Management System
Conduct Quality Assurance Review of Documents
Correct Document Defects and Regenerate if Necessary
Prepare Initial Premium Billing and Billing Arrangements
Scan and Index Policy Documents to Document Management System
Coordinate Physical and Electronic Policy Delivery
Verify Policy Activation and System Configuration
Conduct Post-Issuance Customer Service Outreach
Archive Complete Policy File and Close Issuance Process

affected_tasks: Retrieve and Validate Approved New Business Application
Perform Compliance and Regulatory Review
Create Policy Record in Management System
patterns.recommendation: Invest in AI copilot tools to maximize augmentation benefits

patterns.description: Tasks with many dependencies may create workflow bottlenecks
affected_tasks: Verify Policy Activation and System Configuration
patterns.recommendation: Review dependency chains for parallelization opportunities

recommendations.primary_strategy: Implement a phased AI augmentation approach, starting with quick wins and progressively automating more tasks
key_actions: Prioritize automation of 4 fully automatable tasks
Implement AI augmentation for 11 human-AI collaborative tasks
Review 0 human-only tasks for future augmentation potential
risks: Change management resistance from workforce transitioning to AI-augmented workflows
Data quality issues may impact AI automation effectiveness
Integration complexity with existing systems and processes
success_factors: Executive sponsorship and clear communication of AI strategy
Phased implementation with regular feedback loops
Robust training programs for workforce upskilling

name: Policy Renewal Processing and Issuance
description: Complete renewal workflow from renewal quote generation through underwriting approval, policy issuance, document delivery, and billing setup for renewed policies. Includes handling of expedited renewals and conditional approvals.
objective: Maximize policy retention and ensure seamless renewal experience by processing renewals efficiently while maintaining compliance and accurate documentation.

tasks.name: Identify Policies Due for Renewal
tasks.description: Query policy management system to identify all policies reaching renewal date within the next 60 days and segment by product line and risk profile.
tasks.expected_output: Renewal candidate list with policy numbers, customer information, current coverage details, and renewal dates

tasks.name: Generate Renewal Quotes
tasks.description: Calculate renewal premium rates based on current policy terms, claims history, underwriting guidelines, and applicable rate changes for each renewal candidate.
tasks.expected_output: Renewal quote documents with premium calculations, coverage summaries, and effective dates for customer presentation

tasks.name: Deliver Renewal Quotes to Customers and Agents
tasks.description: Distribute renewal quotes through appropriate channels (email, portal, agent systems) and track delivery confirmation for audit trail purposes.
tasks.expected_output: Delivery confirmation records, customer communication logs, and agent notification confirmations

tasks.name: Process Customer Renewal Responses and Coverage Changes
tasks.description: Review customer responses to renewal quotes, process any requested coverage modifications, and flag non-standard changes requiring underwriting review.
tasks.expected_output: Updated renewal applications with customer-approved changes, flagged items for complex case review, and standard change processing tickets

tasks.name: Route Standard Changes to Automated Processing
tasks.description: Separate routine renewal changes (address updates, name corrections, standard coverage adjustments) and submit to automated workflow for rapid processing.
tasks.expected_output: Standard change processing queue with automated validation results and completion confirmations

tasks.name: Route Complex Changes to Underwriting Review
tasks.description: Escalate non-standard coverage changes, high-risk modifications, and conditional approval scenarios to underwriting team with complete documentation and risk assessment.
tasks.expected_output: Underwriting review packages with policy details, change requests, risk analysis, and compliance documentation

tasks.name: Conduct Underwriting Review and Issue Approval Decision
tasks.description: Evaluate complex renewal changes, assess underwriting risk, apply underwriting guidelines, and issue approval, conditional approval, or denial decisions with documented rationale.
tasks.expected_output: Underwriting decision documentation with approval status, conditions (if applicable), required actions, and compliance sign-off

tasks.name: Process Conditional Approvals and Expedited Renewals
tasks.description: Handle time-sensitive renewals with expedited processing and manage conditional approvals requiring customer action or documentation before policy issuance.
tasks.expected_output: Expedited renewal processing records, conditional approval notifications to customers, and follow-up tracking for condition fulfillment

tasks.name: Generate Renewal Policy Documents
tasks.description: Create final renewal policy documents including declarations pages, coverage schedules, endorsements, and all required regulatory disclosures based on approved renewal terms.
tasks.expected_output: Complete renewal policy document packages with all required pages, signatures, and compliance documentation ready for delivery

tasks.name: Perform Quality Assurance Review of Renewal Documents
tasks.description: Conduct comprehensive quality checks on generated renewal documents for accuracy, completeness, regulatory compliance, and proper formatting before delivery.
tasks.expected_output: QA approval documentation, error correction logs, and certified renewal document packages ready for customer delivery

tasks.name: Deliver Renewal Policies to Customers and Agents
tasks.description: Distribute final renewal policy documents through appropriate channels with delivery confirmation, customer communication, and agent notifications.
tasks.expected_output: Policy delivery confirmation records, customer communication logs, agent delivery notifications, and policy effective date confirmations

tasks.name: Index and File Renewal Documents in Document Management System
tasks.description: Scan, index, and organize all renewal policy documents and supporting correspondence into the document management system with proper metadata and compliance tagging.
tasks.expected_output: Indexed renewal document files with complete audit trail, searchable metadata, and compliance-tagged records in document management system

tasks.name: Set Up Billing for Renewed Policies
tasks.description: Configure billing records for renewed policies including premium amounts, billing frequency, payment due dates, and applicable billing adjustments in the billing system.
tasks.expected_output: Activated billing records with correct premium amounts, billing schedules, payment terms, and integration with accounts receivable system

tasks.name: Generate and Deliver Renewal Billing Statements
tasks.description: Create and distribute renewal premium billing statements to customers with payment instructions, due dates, and available payment methods.
tasks.expected_output: Billing statement documents, delivery confirmations, and payment tracking records in billing system

tasks.name: Complete Renewal Processing and Archive Records
tasks.description: Finalize renewal workflow by updating policy status to active, archiving renewal processing records, and generating renewal completion reports for management review.
tasks.expected_output: Renewal completion reports, archived renewal files, updated policy status records, and workflow closure documentation

quick_wins.task: Identify Policies Due for Renewal
Deliver Renewal Quotes to Customers and Agents
Route Standard Changes to Automated Processing
Generate Renewal Policy Documents
Deliver Renewal Policies to Customers and Agents
Set Up Billing for Renewed Policies
Generate and Deliver Renewal Billing Statements
Complete Renewal Processing and Archive Records

name: Standard Policy Change Processing
description: Processing of routine policy modifications including address updates, name changes, and standard coverage modifications using automated workflows and system-based processing with customer communication.
objective: Efficiently handle high-volume routine policy changes while maintaining accuracy and providing timely customer communication to support policy retention.

tasks.name: Receive and Validate Policy Change Request
tasks.description: Receive customer policy change request through multiple channels (online portal, phone, email, agent) and perform initial validation for completeness and eligibility.
tasks.expected_output: Validated request ticket with customer information, policy number, requested changes, and submission channel documented in system

tasks.name: Classify Policy Change Type and Determine Processing Path
tasks.description: Automatically classify the requested change (address update, name change, coverage modification) and route to appropriate processing workflow based on complexity rules.
tasks.expected_output: Change classification record with processing path assignment, complexity level determination, and routing decision documented

tasks.name: Verify Customer Identity and Policy Ownership
tasks.description: Confirm customer identity through multi-factor verification and validate that the requestor has authority to modify the policy.
tasks.expected_output: Identity verification confirmation with authentication method used, verification timestamp, and authorization status recorded

tasks.name: Retrieve and Review Current Policy Details
tasks.description: Access the policy management system to retrieve complete current policy information including coverage, endorsements, billing status, and any active holds or restrictions.
tasks.expected_output: Complete policy record snapshot with all current terms, coverage details, endorsements, and account status flags displayed for review

tasks.name: Validate Change Request Against Policy Terms and Regulations
tasks.description: Verify that the requested change is permissible under policy terms, state regulations, and company underwriting guidelines for standard modifications.
tasks.expected_output: Validation report confirming change eligibility, identifying any regulatory constraints, and flagging any items requiring escalation to underwriting

tasks.name: Check for Billing Impact and Premium Adjustments
tasks.description: Calculate any premium adjustments, billing impacts, or refunds resulting from the requested policy change and determine effective date for billing changes.
tasks.expected_output: Premium calculation worksheet showing old and new premium amounts, adjustment calculations, effective dates, and billing impact summary

tasks.name: Process Policy Change in Management System
tasks.description: Execute the approved policy change in the policy management system, updating all relevant fields, coverage details, and effective dates.
tasks.expected_output: Updated policy record in system with change timestamp, version control documentation, and audit trail of modifications recorded

tasks.name: Generate Policy Change Documentation
tasks.description: Automatically generate endorsement documents, amendment forms, or confirmation letters reflecting the approved policy changes with all required legal and regulatory language.
tasks.expected_output: Complete set of policy change documents including endorsements, amendments, and customer confirmation letters ready for delivery

tasks.name: Perform Quality Assurance Review of Changes
tasks.description: Conduct comprehensive quality assurance review of the processed change including system updates, documentation accuracy, calculations, and compliance verification.
tasks.expected_output: QA checklist completion report confirming all changes are accurate, complete, and compliant with no errors identified or documented exceptions noted

tasks.name: Update Billing System with Premium Changes
tasks.description: Apply approved premium adjustments to the billing system, creating billing transactions for any refunds, additional charges, or payment plan modifications.
tasks.expected_output: Billing system update confirmation with transaction records created, effective dates applied, and billing statement generation triggered

tasks.name: Scan and Index Change Documentation
tasks.description: Scan all policy change documents and correspondence into the document management system with proper indexing, metadata tagging, and file organization.
tasks.expected_output: Indexed document records in document management system with complete metadata, searchable fields, and proper file linking to policy record

tasks.name: Generate and Send Customer Communication
tasks.description: Send personalized customer communication via preferred channel (email, mail, SMS) confirming the policy change, effective date, new premium amount, and next steps.
tasks.expected_output: Delivered customer communication with confirmation of delivery method, timestamp, and customer acknowledgment recorded in system

tasks.name: Notify Agent of Policy Change Completion
tasks.description: Send notification to the agent of record confirming completion of the policy change with updated policy details and any relevant commission or compensation adjustments.
tasks.expected_output: Agent notification message with policy change summary, effective date, updated policy details, and any system-generated alerts or follow-up actions

tasks.name: Create Audit Trail and Close Request
tasks.description: Complete the policy change request by documenting full audit trail, recording all actions taken, timestamps, and user IDs, then close the request in the workflow system.
tasks.expected_output: Closed request record with complete audit trail documentation, all transaction references linked, and workflow status updated to completed

tasks.name: Monitor and Report on Processing Metrics
tasks.description: Track policy change processing metrics including cycle time, accuracy rates, customer satisfaction, and volume trends for continuous process improvement and reporting.
tasks.expected_output: Daily/weekly processing metrics dashboard with KPI tracking, trend analysis, exception reports, and recommendations for process optimization

Retrieve and Review Current Policy Details

Generate Policy Change Documentation
Update Billing System with Premium Changes
Generate and Send Customer Communication

Create Audit Trail and Close Request

name: Complex Policy Change and Endorsement Management
description: End-to-end handling of intricate policy modifications including coverage changes, beneficiary updates, multi-product adjustments, and non-standard requests requiring manual review, underwriting approval, and compliance coordination.
objective: Accurately process complex policy changes while ensuring underwriting compliance and managing risk through proper approval workflows and documentation.

tasks.name: Initial Policy Change Request Intake and Classification
tasks.description: Receive and log complex policy change request, extract key information, and classify the type of modification required (coverage change, beneficiary update, multi-product adjustment, or non-standard request).
tasks.expected_output: Classified request ticket with extracted details, change type categorization, and initial completeness assessment

tasks.name: Validate Customer Identity and Policy Eligibility
tasks.description: Verify customer identity through policy records, confirm policy is active and eligible for requested modifications, and check for any existing holds or restrictions.
tasks.expected_output: Validation report confirming customer identity, policy status, and eligibility for requested changes

tasks.name: Conduct Comprehensive Policy and Coverage Analysis
tasks.description: Review current policy terms, coverage limits, exclusions, and beneficiary designations to assess impact of requested changes on existing coverage and identify potential conflicts or gaps.
tasks.expected_output: Detailed coverage analysis document identifying current policy structure, requested changes, and potential coverage implications

tasks.name: Assess Underwriting and Compliance Requirements
tasks.description: Evaluate whether requested changes require underwriting review, compliance approval, or regulatory filing based on policy type, change magnitude, and company underwriting guidelines.
tasks.expected_output: Underwriting assessment document specifying required approvals, compliance checks, and regulatory filing needs

tasks.name: Prepare Underwriting Submission Package
tasks.description: Compile all relevant policy documents, change request details, coverage analysis, and supporting documentation into a comprehensive underwriting submission package.
tasks.expected_output: Complete underwriting submission package with organized documentation, change summary, and risk assessment

tasks.name: Submit for Underwriting Review and Approval
tasks.description: Route underwriting submission package to appropriate underwriting team member and track submission status through underwriting approval workflow.
tasks.expected_output: Underwriting submission confirmation with ticket number, assigned underwriter, and expected review timeline

tasks.name: Monitor Underwriting Review Progress and Address Queries
tasks.description: Track underwriting review status, respond to underwriter inquiries or requests for additional information, and facilitate communication between customer and underwriting team.
tasks.expected_output: Updated submission with any additional information provided, underwriter communication log, and revised timeline

tasks.name: Process Underwriting Decision and Conditions
tasks.description: Receive underwriting approval or conditional approval decision, document any approval conditions or requirements, and determine next steps based on underwriting outcome.
tasks.expected_output: Underwriting decision documentation with approval status, any conditions imposed, and action plan for implementation

tasks.name: Coordinate Compliance and Regulatory Filing
tasks.description: Execute required compliance checks, prepare regulatory filings if needed, and ensure all non-standard requests meet regulatory requirements and company compliance standards.
tasks.expected_output: Compliance verification report, completed regulatory filings (if applicable), and compliance sign-off documentation

tasks.name: Calculate Premium Adjustments and Billing Impact
tasks.description: Calculate any premium changes resulting from coverage modifications, determine effective date for changes, and prepare billing adjustment instructions for implementation.
tasks.expected_output: Premium calculation worksheet showing old and new premiums, adjustment amount, effective date, and billing instruction document

tasks.name: Update Policy Records and System Configuration
tasks.description: Input approved changes into policy management system, update coverage details, beneficiary information, and all relevant policy fields to reflect authorized modifications.
tasks.expected_output: Updated policy records in system with all changes reflected, system audit trail documenting modifications, and change confirmation report

tasks.name: Generate and Review Endorsement Documents
tasks.description: Generate policy endorsement documents reflecting all approved changes, review for accuracy and compliance, and prepare documents for customer delivery.
tasks.expected_output: Completed endorsement documents, quality assurance review checklist, and document delivery package ready for issuance

tasks.name: Process Billing Adjustments and Update Billing Records
tasks.description: Apply premium adjustments to billing system, generate revised billing statements, and process any required refunds or additional charges based on effective date of changes.
tasks.expected_output: Updated billing records, revised billing statements, refund or charge documentation, and billing confirmation to customer

tasks.name: Deliver Endorsement Documents and Communicate Changes to Customer
tasks.description: Deliver completed endorsement documents to customer through appropriate channel, provide clear explanation of changes, effective dates, and any billing adjustments.
tasks.expected_output: Delivery confirmation, customer communication record, and documentation of customer acknowledgment of changes

tasks.name: Archive Documentation and Close Change Request
tasks.description: Scan and index all policy change documentation into document management system, file all supporting records, and formally close the change request ticket with completion summary.
tasks.expected_output: Archived documentation in document management system, indexed file records, and closed change request ticket with completion summary and audit trail

name: Premium Billing and Collection Lifecycle
description: Complete billing cycle from premium calculation and bill generation through payment processing, collections management for delinquent accounts, and accounts receivable reconciliation. Includes handling of payment arrangements and policy reinstatement.
objective: Maximize cash flow and minimize delinquency by ensuring accurate billing, timely collections, and effective management of payment arrangements while maintaining customer relationships.

tasks.name: Extract and Validate Policy Data for Billing
tasks.description: Retrieve active policies from the policy management system and validate policy data completeness, coverage details, and billing frequency for premium calculation.
tasks.expected_output: Validated policy dataset with confirmed coverage terms, billing cycles, and customer information ready for premium calculation

tasks.name: Calculate Premium Amounts and Apply Rating Adjustments
tasks.description: Calculate base premiums using actuarial tables and apply all applicable rating adjustments, discounts, surcharges, and policy-specific modifications.
tasks.expected_output: Detailed premium calculation worksheet showing base premium, adjustments, and final billable amount for each policy

tasks.name: Perform Premium Audit and Reconciliation
tasks.description: Conduct desk audits to verify premium calculations against policy records, claims data, and previous billing to identify discrepancies and ensure compliance.
tasks.expected_output: Audit reconciliation report documenting verified premiums, identified discrepancies, and required adjustments with supporting documentation

tasks.name: Generate Billing Statements and Invoices
tasks.description: Create formatted billing statements and invoices for all policies with calculated premiums, due dates, payment terms, and payment instructions.
tasks.expected_output: Batch of billing statements and invoices formatted for distribution via mail, email, or customer portal with all required regulatory disclosures

tasks.name: Distribute Billing Documents to Customers
tasks.description: Deliver billing statements through appropriate channels (mail, email, portal) and confirm successful delivery while maintaining audit trail for compliance.
tasks.expected_output: Distribution confirmation report showing delivery method, date, and recipient confirmation for all billing statements

tasks.name: Process Premium Payments and Apply to Accounts
tasks.description: Receive and process premium payments from multiple channels, apply payments to customer accounts, and generate payment confirmations.
tasks.expected_output: Payment transaction records with applied amounts, payment method documentation, and customer confirmation receipts

tasks.name: Monitor Payment Status and Identify Delinquencies
tasks.description: Track payment status against due dates, identify overdue accounts, and flag policies at risk of lapse for collections management.
tasks.expected_output: Delinquency report categorized by aging bucket (30, 60, 90+ days) with account details and payment history for collections prioritization

tasks.name: Initiate Collections Outreach for Standard Delinquencies
tasks.description: Contact policyholders with overdue premiums through phone, email, or mail using collection management system to document outreach efforts and payment status.
tasks.expected_output: Collections activity log documenting contact attempts, customer responses, and commitment to pay or payment arrangement agreements

tasks.name: Manage Payment Arrangements and Installment Plans
tasks.description: Negotiate and establish payment arrangements for delinquent accounts, document agreed terms, and set up automated payment schedules or manual tracking.
tasks.expected_output: Payment arrangement agreements with documented terms, payment schedule, and system configuration for tracking installment payments

tasks.name: Escalate High-Priority and Complex Collection Cases
tasks.description: Identify high-value delinquent accounts and complex payment situations requiring specialized handling, and escalate to collections specialist for negotiation and potential legal action.
tasks.expected_output: Escalation documentation with account analysis, collection history, and recommended action plan for high-priority accounts

tasks.name: Process Policy Reinstatement Requests
tasks.description: Review reinstatement requests from lapsed policies, verify payment of outstanding premiums and applicable reinstatement fees, and process policy reactivation.
tasks.expected_output: Reinstatement approval documentation with payment confirmation, updated policy status, and customer communication confirming coverage restoration

tasks.name: Process Policy Cancellations for Non-Payment
tasks.description: Execute policy cancellations for accounts with unresolved delinquencies after collection efforts, generate cancellation notices, and update policy status.
tasks.expected_output: Cancellation documentation including notice of cancellation, effective date, final billing adjustment, and compliance confirmation

tasks.name: Reconcile Billing Records with General Ledger
tasks.description: Reconcile billing system records with general ledger accounts, investigate discrepancies between billed amounts and recorded revenue, and process necessary adjustments.
tasks.expected_output: Reconciliation report documenting matched transactions, identified discrepancies, adjustment journal entries, and variance explanations

tasks.name: Analyze Accounts Receivable Aging and Delinquency Trends
tasks.description: Analyze AR aging reports, identify trends in delinquency patterns, and develop strategies to improve cash flow and collection rates.
tasks.expected_output: AR analysis report with aging summary, delinquency trends, root cause analysis, and recommended process improvements or collection strategies

tasks.name: Prepare Financial Reporting and Close Billing Cycle
tasks.description: Compile billing and collections data for financial reporting, prepare month-end close documentation, and communicate results to finance and management.
tasks.expected_output: Financial close package including AR subsidiary ledger reconciliation, billing summary, collections performance metrics, and management reporting

Generate Billing Statements and Invoices
Monitor Payment Status and Identify Delinquencies

name: Premium Audit and Adjustment Process
description: Complete audit workflow including field audits of commercial policies, desk audits for remote verification, audit report generation, and processing of premium adjustments and corrections based on audit findings.
objective: Ensure accurate premium calculations, identify billing discrepancies, and optimize premium revenue through systematic audit and reconciliation processes.

tasks.name: Identify and Select Policies for Audit
tasks.description: Review policy portfolio and select commercial policies for field and desk audits based on risk criteria, premium volume, and audit history.
tasks.expected_output: Audit selection list with policy numbers, customer names, premium amounts, and audit type assignments (field or desk)

tasks.name: Schedule and Coordinate Field Audits
tasks.description: Contact commercial policyholders to schedule on-site audit visits and coordinate logistics including date, time, and required documentation.
tasks.expected_output: Confirmed audit schedule with customer contact information, appointment details, and pre-audit documentation requests

tasks.name: Conduct On-Site Field Audits
tasks.description: Visit customer locations to review payroll records, sales data, operational metrics, and other supporting documentation to verify premium calculations accuracy.
tasks.expected_output: Detailed field audit working papers including documentation reviewed, calculations verified, and preliminary findings noted

tasks.name: Prepare Field Audit Reports
tasks.description: Compile field audit findings into formal reports documenting premium adjustments, discrepancies identified, and recommendations for policy corrections.
tasks.expected_output: Comprehensive field audit reports with executive summary, detailed findings, premium adjustment calculations, and supporting documentation

tasks.name: Execute Desk Audits and Remote Verification
tasks.description: Perform remote premium audits by reconciling policy records against billing system data, claims history, and operational records to identify discrepancies.
tasks.expected_output: Desk audit working papers documenting records reviewed, discrepancies identified, and preliminary adjustment calculations

tasks.name: Prepare Desk Audit Reports
tasks.description: Document desk audit findings including policy discrepancies, premium adjustment calculations, and compliance observations in formal audit reports.
tasks.expected_output: Desk audit reports with findings summary, detailed discrepancy analysis, premium adjustment recommendations, and compliance notes

tasks.name: Review and Validate Audit Findings
tasks.description: Senior administrator reviews all field and desk audit reports to validate findings, verify calculations, and ensure compliance with audit standards and regulatory requirements.
tasks.expected_output: Validated audit reports with approval sign-off, noted exceptions, and cleared findings ready for adjustment processing

tasks.name: Calculate Premium Adjustments
tasks.description: Compute premium adjustment amounts based on audit findings, including additional premiums due, overpayments, and billing corrections with supporting calculations.
tasks.expected_output: Premium adjustment schedules with policy-level calculations, adjustment amounts, effective dates, and billing impact analysis

tasks.name: Process Premium Adjustments in Billing System
tasks.description: Enter approved premium adjustments into the billing system to generate corrected invoices, credit memos, or refund transactions as appropriate.
tasks.expected_output: Processed adjustments in billing system with generated billing documents, transaction records, and system confirmation reports

tasks.name: Generate and Distribute Audit Adjustment Notices
tasks.description: Create customer-facing audit adjustment notices explaining findings, premium changes, and payment or refund instructions with clear communication of adjustments.
tasks.expected_output: Formatted audit adjustment notices, billing documents, and customer communication packages ready for distribution

tasks.name: Scan and Index Audit Documentation
tasks.description: Scan all audit working papers, field reports, supporting documents, and adjustment records into the document management system with proper indexing and metadata.
tasks.expected_output: Indexed audit documentation in document management system with searchable records, proper file organization, and audit trail documentation

tasks.name: Reconcile Adjustments to General Ledger
tasks.description: Reconcile all premium adjustments processed against the general ledger to ensure accurate financial recording and accounts receivable impact.
tasks.expected_output: Reconciliation report confirming adjustment amounts match GL entries, variance analysis if applicable, and month-end close support documentation

tasks.name: Monitor Customer Payment Response
tasks.description: Track customer responses to audit adjustment notices, monitor payment receipt for additional premiums due, and manage payment arrangements as needed.
tasks.expected_output: Payment tracking report showing customer responses, received payments, outstanding balances, and any payment arrangement agreements

tasks.name: Escalate Delinquent Adjustment Accounts
tasks.description: Identify and escalate accounts with unpaid audit adjustments to collections team for follow-up and resolution of outstanding balances.
tasks.expected_output: Delinquent account escalation list with policy details, adjustment amounts, aging information, and collections assignment

tasks.name: Generate Audit Process Summary and Analytics
tasks.description: Compile comprehensive audit cycle summary including total adjustments processed, revenue impact, discrepancy trends, and process performance metrics for management review.
tasks.expected_output: Audit cycle summary report with financial impact analysis, trend identification, process metrics, and recommendations for future audit cycles

recommendations.primary_strategy: Invest in AI augmentation tools to support human-led tasks, focusing on efficiency gains and error reduction
key_actions: Prioritize automation of 0 fully automatable tasks
Implement AI augmentation for 13 human-AI collaborative tasks
Review 2 human-only tasks for future augmentation potential
risks: Change management resistance from workforce transitioning to AI-augmented workflows
Data quality issues may impact AI automation effectiveness
Integration complexity with existing systems and processes
success_factors: Executive sponsorship and clear communication of AI strategy
Phased implementation with regular feedback loops
Robust training programs for workforce upskilling

name: Policy Document Management and Compliance
description: End-to-end document lifecycle including scanning, indexing, quality assurance, filing, retention management, and compliance verification for all policy files and customer correspondence in the document management system.
objective: Maintain accurate, compliant, and accessible policy records while ensuring regulatory compliance with document retention requirements and optimizing document management system efficiency.

tasks.name: Incoming Document Receipt and Initial Triage
tasks.description: Receive and categorize incoming policy documents and customer correspondence by document type, policy line, and urgency level for processing queue assignment.
tasks.expected_output: Triaged document batch with classification tags and priority assignments ready for scanning

tasks.name: Document Scanning and Image Capture
tasks.description: Scan all incoming physical documents into high-resolution digital images with proper orientation, clarity, and metadata capture for indexing.
tasks.expected_output: Digitized document images with embedded metadata and quality verification flags

tasks.name: Automated Document Classification and Indexing
tasks.description: Apply AI-powered optical character recognition (OCR) and machine learning algorithms to automatically classify documents, extract key data fields, and assign indexing metadata.
tasks.expected_output: Indexed documents with extracted data fields, document type classifications, and policy/customer reference numbers populated in DMS

tasks.name: Manual Indexing Quality Assurance Review
tasks.description: Verify automated indexing accuracy by sampling documents, validating extracted data fields, policy references, and metadata completeness against source documents.
tasks.expected_output: QA verification report with accuracy metrics, identified indexing errors, and correction queue for failed validations

tasks.name: Correct Indexing Errors and Reprocess Failed Documents
tasks.description: Manually correct indexing errors identified in QA review, re-index failed documents, and revalidate corrections to ensure accurate DMS records.
tasks.expected_output: Corrected and revalidated document records with updated indexing metadata in DMS

tasks.name: Policy File Organization and Logical Folder Structure
tasks.description: Organize indexed documents into logical folder hierarchies within DMS by policy number, customer account, document type, and date to enable efficient retrieval and compliance tracking.
tasks.expected_output: Organized document repository with standardized folder structure and cross-referenced policy files ready for filing

tasks.name: Compliance and Regulatory Requirements Verification
tasks.description: Verify that all documents meet regulatory compliance requirements including document completeness, required signatures, disclosures, and retention rule applicability per insurance regulations.
tasks.expected_output: Compliance verification report identifying missing documents, signature gaps, or regulatory violations requiring remediation

tasks.name: Remediate Compliance Exceptions and Document Gaps
tasks.description: Address identified compliance violations by obtaining missing documents, securing required signatures, adding required disclosures, or escalating non-remediable issues to policy administration.
tasks.expected_output: Remediated document files with compliance exceptions resolved or escalation tickets created for policy team review

tasks.name: Assign Document Retention Rules and Lifecycle Dates
tasks.description: Apply appropriate document retention policies based on document type, policy status, regulatory requirements, and insurance line to establish retention periods and destruction dates in DMS.
tasks.expected_output: Documents tagged with retention classification, retention period duration, and calculated destruction/purge dates in DMS

tasks.name: Final Document Quality Assurance and Completeness Check
tasks.description: Conduct comprehensive final QA review of all processed documents verifying image quality, indexing accuracy, folder organization, compliance status, and retention rule assignment before archival.
tasks.expected_output: Final QA certification report with pass/fail status and sign-off for document batch ready for archival

tasks.name: Archive Documents to Long-Term Storage and DMS
tasks.description: Move finalized, QA-approved documents to permanent archival location in DMS with appropriate access controls, backup configurations, and disaster recovery provisions.
tasks.expected_output: Archived documents with confirmed storage location, backup verification, and access control configuration in DMS

tasks.name: Monitor Document Retention and Schedule Purge Activities
tasks.description: Continuously monitor document retention schedules, identify documents approaching destruction dates, and execute automated or manual purge processes per retention policies.
tasks.expected_output: Purge execution report documenting destroyed documents, retention compliance verification, and updated DMS records

tasks.name: Generate Compliance and Audit Reports
tasks.description: Generate periodic compliance reports documenting document processing volumes, QA metrics, retention compliance, regulatory adherence, and system performance for audit and management review.
tasks.expected_output: Comprehensive compliance and audit reports with metrics, trend analysis, and recommendations for process improvements

tasks.name: Optimize DMS Performance and System Maintenance
tasks.description: Monitor DMS system performance, execute database optimization, manage storage utilization, and implement system improvements to ensure efficient document retrieval and compliance tracking.
tasks.expected_output: System optimization report with performance metrics, storage utilization analysis, and implemented improvements

tasks.name: Continuous Process Improvement and Stakeholder Communication
tasks.description: Review document management metrics, gather feedback from policy administration teams, identify process bottlenecks, and implement continuous improvements while communicating updates to stakeholders.
tasks.expected_output: Process improvement recommendations, stakeholder communication updates, and documented process enhancements for workflow optimization

name: Customer Inquiry and Policy Information Management
description: Comprehensive process for handling customer inquiries regarding policy details, coverage information, and policy status, including research, response coordination, and escalation of complex issues to senior administrators.
objective: Provide timely and accurate customer service while resolving policy inquiries efficiently and identifying opportunities for policy enhancement or retention.

tasks.name: Receive and Log Customer Inquiry
tasks.description: Capture incoming customer inquiry through multiple channels (phone, email, portal) and create initial ticket with customer and policy information.
tasks.expected_output: Inquiry ticket with customer details, contact information, policy number, and inquiry type classification

tasks.name: Classify Inquiry Type and Complexity Level
tasks.description: Analyze inquiry content to determine category (coverage question, policy status, claims-related, billing, modification request) and assess complexity level for routing.
tasks.expected_output: Inquiry classification with complexity assessment (routine, moderate, complex) and recommended routing path

tasks.name: Retrieve and Verify Policy Information
tasks.description: Access policy management system to pull complete policy details, coverage information, endorsement history, and customer account status for verification.
tasks.expected_output: Verified policy record with current coverage details, premium status, endorsements, and customer profile information

tasks.name: Research Policy Coverage and Regulatory Requirements
tasks.description: Conduct detailed research on applicable policy provisions, coverage limits, exclusions, and relevant regulatory requirements to accurately address customer inquiry.
tasks.expected_output: Research summary document with applicable policy language, coverage analysis, regulatory citations, and compliance considerations

tasks.name: Determine Routing for Routine vs. Complex Inquiries
tasks.description: Route inquiry to appropriate handler based on complexity assessment: routine inquiries to Policy Administrator I, complex issues to Senior Policy Administrator or specialized processors.
tasks.expected_output: Routing decision with assigned handler, priority level, and escalation path if needed

tasks.name: Prepare Comprehensive Response to Customer Inquiry
tasks.description: Develop detailed, accurate response addressing customer question with relevant policy information, coverage details, and any necessary disclaimers or next steps.
tasks.expected_output: Draft response document with clear explanation, policy references, coverage details, and recommended actions or solutions

tasks.name: Identify Policy Enhancement or Retention Opportunities
tasks.description: Analyze customer inquiry context to identify potential cross-sell opportunities, coverage gaps, policy upgrades, or retention risks that should be communicated to customer.
tasks.expected_output: Opportunity assessment document with identified gaps, recommended enhancements, and retention strategies

tasks.name: Review Response for Accuracy and Compliance
tasks.description: Conduct quality assurance review of prepared response to ensure accuracy, completeness, regulatory compliance, and alignment with company standards before delivery.
tasks.expected_output: Reviewed and approved response document with quality assurance sign-off and any required revisions noted

tasks.name: Determine if Policy Modification is Required
tasks.description: Assess whether customer inquiry requires policy changes, endorsements, coverage modifications, or if it can be resolved through information provision alone.
tasks.expected_output: Determination document specifying if modification is needed, type of change required, and complexity level for processing

tasks.name: Route Policy Modification to Appropriate Processor
tasks.description: Direct policy change requests to standard or complex processor based on modification type, underwriting requirements, and compliance considerations.
tasks.expected_output: Routing instruction with assigned processor, modification details, and processing requirements

tasks.name: Deliver Response to Customer
tasks.description: Communicate prepared response to customer through appropriate channel (phone, email, portal) with clear explanation and next steps, documenting delivery method and timestamp.
tasks.expected_output: Delivery confirmation with customer communication record, timestamp, delivery method, and customer acknowledgment

tasks.name: Document Inquiry and Resolution in Policy File
tasks.description: Create comprehensive record of customer inquiry, research conducted, response provided, and any policy modifications or recommendations in policy file and document management system.
tasks.expected_output: Complete inquiry documentation file with all correspondence, research notes, response, and resolution details indexed in document management system

tasks.name: Escalate Complex Issues to Senior Administrator
tasks.description: For inquiries requiring specialized expertise, policy exceptions, or regulatory interpretation, escalate to Senior Policy Administrator with complete case summary and research documentation.
tasks.expected_output: Escalation package with inquiry details, research summary, complexity assessment, and recommended resolution approach

tasks.name: Monitor Inquiry Resolution and Follow-up
tasks.description: Track inquiry status, ensure timely resolution, monitor customer satisfaction, and conduct follow-up if policy modifications were implemented or recommendations provided.
tasks.expected_output: Follow-up documentation with customer feedback, confirmation of resolution, and any additional actions required

tasks.name: Analyze Inquiry Trends and Identify Process Improvements
tasks.description: Periodically review inquiry patterns, common questions, resolution times, and customer feedback to identify process improvements and training needs for policy administration team.
tasks.expected_output: Trend analysis report with identified patterns, process improvement recommendations, and training needs assessment
